title: Bolan
description: My final project at the Multimediadesign education. Here we chose an existing company and created a redesign of their visual identity. We chose Bolan, a pizzeria located in Amager.
expandedDescription: I was lucky to be in a really good exam group with Aleksandra and Petra. Together we with met with Bolan a couple of times to discuss what he wanted out of the project. The result was a visual makeover (digitally). We made a new website, graphic design and SoMe strategy. All of us in the team got to play our strengths and generally we had a good time. Also we got a 12 for our project.

title: GrantOne
description: My internship was at Grant APS. During my time there, I got to work with their application GrantOne, where I partook in designing and developing new features.
expandedDescription: I got in contact with Grant through my job that I had at the time. I was lucky enough to land an internship that lasted from January to March (10 weeks). My main project there was to gather all notifications a user would get in a single interface. This involved figuring out a user-journey, designing and then developing it. It took a lot of trial and error but I was really happy with how it turned out. Unfortunately its not possible to view the GrantOne application without being a customer, and the code is of course not available to the public.

title: Watts
description: Watts is a green tech company working with intelligent energy distribution. Here I help creating webcomponents for their online presence which includes watts.dk and shop.watts.dk
expandedDescription: I have been working at Watts since April, and theres been a lot of technical updates to the code base. So alot of what I have done has actually been to update and optimize a lot existing code instead of creating something entirely new, which has been a different but challenge. Especially Sanity Studio has been fun to work with because I have learnt so much about CMS.

title: Holidaze
description: A modern booking platform built with React and styled-components. Features user authentication, property listings, and booking management.
expandedDescription: This was the final project at the Noroff School of Digital Technology and Digital Media. The project was to create a booking application for residencies, similair to AirBNB. I had already started on my multimedia education, so there was a lot going on at the time. I remember quite well that I installed Bootstrap on the project, but couldnt quite figure out to get SASS installed so it could be customized. Therefore I thought it would be smart to take a shortcut and just try to style it directly with plain css. The result is a pretty janky styled website and serves as a reminder for me to not stress or rush into projects.
